movies.title: The Cockpit
movies.plot: This anthology tells the aviation related stories of three troopers on the Axis side of World War II. The first one is of a disgraced German fighter pilot who is assigned to escort a bomber carrying his love and a fearsome secret cargo. The second story is of a Japanese kamikaze pilot of a guided rocket bomb who, denied his chance in a failed attack in which he survived, is determined to complete his mission despite the odds. Finally, two soldiers attempt to reach an air base to fulfill a promise despite the fact that it might have been rendered moot in the reality of war.
movies.simplePlot: Three aviation focused war stories of Axis participants.

biography.bio: Ken'yû Horiuchi was born on July 30, 1957 in Shizuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Bubblegum Crisis (1987) and Redline (2009).
biography.name: Ken'yû Horiuchi

biography.bio: Hikaru Midorikawa was born on May 2, 1968 in Tochigi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods (2013).
biography.name: Hikaru Midorikawa

biography.bio: Steve was born in Corpus Christi, Texas and lived all over the US and Canada before moving to Los Angeles. He went to Staples High school where he became involved in Drama with the Staples Players under the tutelage of Albert Pia. He moved his senior year and graduated from Marietta High School in Marietta, Ohio. He went to Ohio University and graduated in 1980 with a BFA in Theatre. After brief stints in New York and Florida he made the move to Los Angeles in 1982 where he still resides. He made his TV debut on Amazing Stories and co-starred as Ramirez, the jockey, in the HBO film The Heist with Pierce Brosnan and Tom Skerritt. He lost 25 pounds for the part - his weight loss ability was due in part to his experience as a high school wrestler. In addition to acting on camera, Steve is also a playwright/director and has acted locally on the LA Stages for 30 years in over forty productions. He appeared in Estonia You Fall with John Astin and Dennis Dugan at The Mark Taper Forum Lab. His play, Flight of the Penguin received a Drama-Logue Award for Best Playwriting and was nominated for LA Weekly Awards for Best Play and Best Ensemble. He has worked in the voice-over world for the past 25 years can be heard in over a thousand episodics and films as well as anime. In 1995 he married actress Karen Person and in 1997 they had a son, Nicholas.
biography.name: Stephen Apostolina

biography.bio: Kanetaka Arimoto is an actor, known for The Tokyo Project (1988), The Cockpit (1994) and Project A-Ko 3: Cinderella Rhapsody (1988).
biography.name: Kanetaka Arimoto

biography.bio: The son of a Colombian father and an American mother, David grew up in Venezuela before moving to the United States. He is married to actress Heidi Kling.
biography.name: David Berón

biography.bio: Richard Cansino was born on September 10, 1953 in Los Angeles, California, USA. He is known for his work on Ghost in the Shell (1995), Assassin's Creed (2007) and Ninja Scroll (1993).
biography.name: Richard Cansino

biography.bio: Bill Capizzi was born on March 21, 1937 in Somerville, Massachusetts, USA as William Capizzi. He is known for his work on Babe, le cochon dans la ville (1998), Don Juan DeMarco (1994) and Bulletproof (1996). He died on March 26, 2007 in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA.
biography.name: Bill Capizzi

biography.bio: Christopher Carroll is an actor, known for Primal Fear (1996), Little Nicky (2000) and Akira (1988).
biography.name: Christopher Carroll

biography.bio: Peter Doyle is known for his work on Akira (1988), Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex (2002) and Patlabor 2: The Movie (1993).
biography.name: Peter Doyle

biography.bio: Eddie Frierson was born on November 22, 1959 in Akron, Ohio, USA as Edward Davies Frierson. He is known for his work on Frozen (2013), Tangled (2010) and Moneyball (2011).
biography.name: Eddie Frierson

biography.bio: Keiji Fujiwara was born on October 5, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Eureka Seven (2005) and Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters (2012).
biography.name: Keiji Fujiwara

biography.bio: Nobuaki Fukuda was born on December 18, 1950 in Nagasaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Silence (2016), Naruto Shippûden: The Lost Tower (2010) and Naruto: Shippûden (2007).
biography.name: Nobuaki Fukuda

biography.bio: Masao Horiuchi is an actor, known for The Cockpit (1994).
biography.name: Masao Horiuchi

biography.bio: Mitsuaki Hoshino was born on February 19, 1959 in Shizuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kenshin le Vagabond - Le Chapitre de la Mémoire (1999), Origine (2006) and Naruto Shippuden the Movie: Blood Prison (2011).
biography.name: Mitsuaki Hoshino

biography.bio: Eiji Itô was born on July 21, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Animation Runner Kuromi (2001), Animation Runner Kuromi 2 (2004) and Chîsana kyojin Microman (1999).
biography.name: Eiji Itô
